snippet: A federal judge on Wednesday rejected a request made by television broadcasters to stop Aereo from streaming local TV stations' signals to customers over the Internet.
abstract: A federal judge on Wednesday rejected a request made by television broadcasters to stop Aereo from streaming local TV stations' signals to customers over the Internet.

headline.main: Judge Says Aereo, a TV Streaming Service, May Continue
headline.print_headline: Judge Says Aereo, a TV Streaming Service, May Continue
